I have moved to ETH Zurich! This site is no longer maintained. Find my current site here .

Hi, you've reached Drew Johnson's professional webpage. I am currently a Paul Olum postdoctoral fellow at the University of Oregon working in algebraic geometry. I started this position Fall 2016.

Previously, I received my PhD from the University of Utah, and a BS and MS from Brigham Young University.
